name: Monster Academy (itch)
description:
Do you wanna be a proper monster? this is your academy!! :)

Use your mouse and speed in this 30 seconds minigame of minigames!

This is a shrinked down version of my Ludum Dare #33 entry for Oujevipo Contest #2,
using constraint #2 (the core of the gameplay is 29.30 seconds).

-Chrome browser is highly recommended-
